<!DOCTYPE html>

  <head>
   <title>
    Domain pending ICANN verification.
   </title>
   <meta content="noindex, nofollow" name="robots"/>
   <!-- Start Stylesheets -->
   <!-- Approve Move Stylesheet for Default Colours -->

   <!-- End Custom Stylesheet Loaded by Reseller -->
   <!-- Approve Move Stylesheet for Default Layouts -->
   <link href="/styles/am-default-styles-1.0.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
   <!-- End Stylesheets -->
   <script src="https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api.js">
   </script>
  </head>
  <body>
   <form action="./" id="form1" method="post">
    <input id="__VIEWSTATE" name="__VIEWSTATE" type="hidden" value=""/>
    <input id="__VIEWSTATEGENERATOR" name="__VIEWSTATEGENERATOR" type="hidden" value="CA0B0334"/>
    <input id="__EVENTVALIDATION" name="__EVENTVALIDATION" type="hidden" value="/wEdAALmSxynvh7Rp9rY3pmZGSfEPOaW1pQztoQA36D1w/+bXXok0nHWVJCju0ISFcRQ+YJep3O/LOrxGROr6eFrwwbP"/>
    <div>
     <div class="cont">
      <div class="detailsPanel" id="formPanel">
       <div id="logoSpace">
        <div>
         <span class="iconAlert" id="lblHeaderIcon">
         </span>
         <span class="logoHeader" id="lblHeader">
          This domain name is pending ICANN verification.
         </span>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="infoBar">
        <p>
         <span id="lblInfoBar">
          Welcome to bodojo.com Domain name registered by Your Domain Services Provider.
         </span>
        </p>
       </div>
       <div class="mainContent">
        <div class="topInfo" id="topInfo">
         <p>
          Please be advised that as of the 1st January 2014 it has now become a mandatory requirement from the Internet Corporation for Assigned Name and Numbers (ICANN) that all ICANN accredited registrars verify the WHOIS contact information for all new domain registrations, domain transfers and registrant contact modifications.
         </p>
         <p>
          ICANN is the body responsible for ensuring a stable and secure internet and developing Registrar and Registrant policy.
         </p>
         <h2>
          <span class="iconQuestionSmall">
          </span>
          <span>
           Why has this domain been suspended?
          </span>
         </h2>
         <p>
          This domain has been suspended due to one of the following three reasons:
         </p>
         <dl>
          <dt>
           A.
          </dt>
          <dd>
           This is a new Domain Registration and you have yet to verify your contact name and email address.
          </dd>
          <dt>
           B.
          </dt>
          <dd>
           This domain has recently been transferred and you have yet to verify your contact name and email address.
          </dd>
          <dt>
           C.
          </dt>
          <dd>
           The Registrant contact data on this domain has been modified but still requires verification.
          </dd>
         </dl>
         <h2>
          <span class="iconAlertSmall">
          </span>
          <span>
           If you are the domain owner, please reactivate this domain.
          </span>
         </h2>
         <dl>
          <dt>
           A.
          </dt>
          <dd>
           If you would like to reactivate this domain name and are the domain owner -
           <span>
            please click on the link within the email that was sent to the Registrant email address on this domain.
           </span>
          </dd>
          <dt>
           B.
          </dt>
          <dd>
           If you would like to resend the verification email to the Registrant email address -
           <span>
            please enter the relevant details below and click the Resend Verification Email button.
           </span>
          </dd>
          <dt>
           C.
          </dt>
          <dd>
           If you have not received the verification email -
           <span>
            please login to your domain control panel and update the Registrant contacts email address for this domain.
           </span>
          </dd>
         </dl>
        </div>
        <div class="recaptchaContainer" id="pnlRecaptcha">
         <div class="g-recaptcha" data-sitekey="6LfHj08UAAAAAJIY8NpEqT33c8BmJsQ6cfF2gRvT">
         </div>
         <div class="additionalControls">
          <span id="lblResult">
           <p>
           </p>
          </span>
          <input class="button" id="btnSubmit" name="btnSubmit" type="submit" value="Resend Verification Email"/>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="bottomInfo" id="bottomInfo">
         <br/>
         <p>
          Once the Registrant contact information has been verified, this domain is estimated to come back online within 24-48 hours.
         </p>
         <p>
          If you are a visitor to this website, please try accessing again later.
         </p>
         <hr/>
         <ul>
          <li>
           ICANN require Registrant contact information or modifications to Registrant contact information to be verified within 15 calendar days. If the details are not verified within this time, the domain will be suspended pending verification - and as per ICANN mandates.
          </li>
          <li>
           Suspension is removed once WHOIS information has been successfully verified.  WHOIS information must be accurate and complete. When updated the domain owner may receive a new verification email.
          </li>
          <li>
           Domain names will come back online once verified, and within an estimated period of 24-48 hours.
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="helpPanel" id="helpPanel">
       <div class="mainContent">
        <div class="footerInfo" id="footerInfo">
         <p class="ftrtxt">
          Copyright © 2018 Heart Internet Ltd.
         </p>
         <p class="ftrtxt">
          Call: 0845 644 7750   Email: sales@heartinternet.co.uk
          <br/>
          Write: Heart Internet Ltd, 2 Castle Quay, Castle Boulevard, Nottingham, NG7 1FW.
         </p>
         <div class="groupLogo">
          <span>
          </span>
         </div>
         <br class="clear"/>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </form>
  </body>
 </html>
